title: Quill
description: A small command-line tool written in C for experimenting with classical cryptographic algorithms. Currently focuses on Caesar cipher analysis and decryption. Built as a learning project to explore low-level programming and basic cryptography concepts.

title: CopperFood
short: Fabric mod adding custom food items to Minecraft
description: A small Fabric mod that adds copper-themed food items with unique effects. Each item is designed around simple trade-offs, such as temporary buffs in exchange for health or situational utility. Built as an experiment in Minecraft modding, focusing on gameplay balance, custom items, and Fabric-based mod development.

title: My Minecraft SMP Website
short: Information website for a Minecraft server
description: A website created for a Minecraft server to document its mechanics, custom features, and connection details. Serves as a clear and centralized reference for players, with an emphasis on structure and readability.

title: Personal Website
description: This website. A personal space for experiments with layout, interaction, and presentation. Built to explore design and small JavaScript interactions.
